Labeling (“STANDUP COMEDY”) for clear content identification.

thumbnail_title_relationship.visual_reinforcement: The thumbnail visually reinforces the title by showing the comedian (Rupali Tyagi) on stage, holding a microphone, with a performative and expressive demeanor. The large yellow title text ('A GIRL'S TRIP TO THAILAND') directly echoes the video's title and places genre/context (stand-up comedy) up front. The presence of Rupali Tyagi aligns with the title's identification of the performer.
thumbnail_title_relationship.contrasts_mismatches: No significant contrast or mismatch. The visual elements (comedy stage, performer) and wording are entirely consistent with the title’s promise of a comedic storytelling set.
